userId.description: The unique identifier of the user assigned the role

id.description: The unique identifier for the role assignment

label.description: The label associated with the role assignment

status.description: The status of the role assignment (e.g., active, inactive)

created.description: The date and time when the role assignment was created

lastUpdated.description: The date and time when the role assignment was last updated

assignmentType.description: The type of role assignment (e.g., direct, indirect)

resource-set.description: The resource set associated with the role assignment

role.description: The role assigned to the user

assignee.description: The link to the user's profile who is assigned the role

herf.description: The URL to access the assignee's profile

role.description: The link to the role assigned to the user

herf.description: The URL to access the role details

resource-set.description: The link to the resource set associated with the role assignment

herf.description: The URL to access the resource set

permissions.description: The link to the permissions associated with the role assignment

herf.description: The URL to access the permissions

member.description: The link to the member's profile who is assigned the role

herf.description: The URL to access the member's profile
